entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 3:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: SE 68 km/h gust 98 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
